synopsis.text: The anime centers around a love triangle between Makoto, a shy high school boy, and two female classmates - Kotonoha and Sekai. Makoto develops feelings for Kotonoha, a girl he admires from afar on his morning train ride to school. Though they ride the same train, she is unaware of his existence. Sekai, Makoto's lively classmate, learns of his crush on Kotonoha and decides to help bring the two together, despite having her own romantic feelings for Makoto. Her meddling succeeds and Makoto and Kotonoha start dating. However, things grow complicated when, in an impulsive moment, Sekai kisses Makoto. This love triangle leads to entanglements between the three friends. The story explores the intertwining romantic relationships of these high school students as they navigate confusion, jealousy, and drama. Their choices test the boundaries of friendship and loyalty.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
